website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality waste basket is the perfect addition to any kitchen needing a sleek, eye-catching trash can.
pros: Swing lid lays flat for attractive design but swings back into place once used
Option to use as an open lid can for large events and parties
Top lid easily comes off of can for simple bag change
cons: On the more expensive side of trash can models

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathroom Laundry Hamper
customer_reviews.text: WE were looking for something sturdy and stainless to use in our bathroom as a laundry hamper but did not want to spend $200-$400 for a stainless laundry hamper. We found this and it works great! We just took our the blue bin inside, added a cotton canvas laundry bag to the insight and we now have an elegant addition to our bathroom at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: hipnotech

customer_reviews.title: Swing top trash can
customer_reviews.text: This is a big trash can! I like it very much as it keeps out odors and there is no peddal to press. My husband though, does not like the fact that ad the can fills up close to the top, the lid really wont swing open so he can cram more garbage in there. That means it needs to be emptied!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST QUALITY TRASH CAN ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: You’ll never need another kitchen trash can. Best money you’ll ever spend.
customer_reviews.author: Slvrldy

customer_reviews.title: ts hard to get anything inside it fills up too ...
customer_reviews.text: ts hard to get anything inside it fills up too quick can't put empty gallon of milk in it
customer_reviews.author: steve troyer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good....but not holding up to cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these trash cans to be used in common areas in the lobby of my hotel. One came in damaged with the ding in the lid that is the size of a quarter. My real disappointment is trying to keep them clean. The finish does not clean well, always spotty and discolored. There are many spots that look like rust around the bottom of two of them that I can not remove. The rust spots happened within 2 weeks. They are sturdy enough and look contemporary. We clean constantly in my hotel and they just don't look clean.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gdovin

customer_reviews.title: Expected more from simplehuman
customer_reviews.text: Top of the can gets hung up on the liner and gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, good looking can,=. Simplehuman is pricey, otherwise 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: NatNev 949

customer_reviews.title: Clean lines and a 10 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this can to replace a similar one that we had for so many years that I forgot it might be under warranty. On well the new can has clean lines, looks great, and is easy to clean. Swing-top make it real convenient to dispose things in the can quickly and quiety.
customer_reviews.author: Ben H.

customer_reviews.title: Simplehuman Steel Trashcan
customer_reviews.text: A Little High priced, but is built very good. I bought it for my daughter for Christmas, and it looks very nice in her kitchen. I like the idea that it has a liner.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my garbage can. It looks more like a piece of Furniture.I will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: andrea gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Love my trash can
customer_reviews.text: Love my trash can, but I wish the top would allow for you to fit more trash in the can.
customer_reviews.author: kylercurtis

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money-barely holds anything.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality can but you can only fill it 3/4 before the lid will hit all your garbage, so you take out nearly half empty bags. With the replacement bags being horribly expensive, it's totally not worth it. We bought a cheap one and quit using this because it was so annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Dirty lid.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, but the revolving lid is an awful design. We bought one for our office. It looks nice, but the lid limits how full it can be, and it's always getting soiled with food debris. Skip this.
customer_reviews.author: scientist guy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this trashcan so much I purchased one for my brother’s new house. The swivel top keeps smells at bay and looks great on display in my stainless steel kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT CAME FULL OF DENTS
customer_reviews.text: I need it a nice garbage can for my son coffee shop, so I decided to buy this trash can, I thought it was really expensive but the reviews were good. I received it in a big heavy box and I never open it until the coffee shop was ready for the big opening ( 1 month after received it ), for my surprise the trash can was damage, Full of dents , it was to complicated to returned ( to heavy) . My recommendation for buyers make sure you check the product as soon as arrives and for the manufacturers you have to make sure your product its well packaged .
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Lid gets messy
customer_reviews.text: It's a good thing it's easy to clean because the lid will get all kinds of nasty on it.
customer_reviews.author: onanon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the $
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 14 of these trash cans last year. The overall look and quality is outstanding. The lid closes every time and the liner make removing bags a snap. Order 2 more this week and need another 16 for another location. I did receive one that was damaged. Due to the size of the boxes I feel it was the carriers fault. They are double boxed in a heavy box. I would recommend for home or office.
customer_reviews.author: joseph2701

customer_reviews.title: Stunning trash cans
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but stunning looking trash cans and nicely designed. The inside of the lids are convex, as they have a weight to make sure they flip back into the right position, so this can be an issue if the bin gets too full. Other than that, I don't have any trouble removing the top, cleaning is easy and and the finish is great.
customer_reviews.author: Turbodelta

customer_reviews.title: Great can. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought our second can of this type. The first has held up perfectly for over 13 years. This new one arrived with the swing top lid assembled incorrectly but called SimpleHuman's customer service and they shipped a brand new lid ASAP. We are very happy with their customer service and with the product!
customer_reviews.author: SatisfiedCustomer

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a trash can with a swing top lid. We had difficulty finding any that fit with our decor. The stainless steel looks institutional, but at least it isn't plastic. The can works well. It is easy to keep clean. This is recommended until someone comes up with a quality product that doesn't look so institutional.
customer_reviews.author: xtsigs

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but excellent. would love those specific garbage bags to be a bit cheaper by the manufacture but will work with regular bags as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Ch

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Not only are the trash can great they are very well made and sturdy. Plus they were shipped to Alaska in only a few days!!! I will be back to buy more . Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Bobbiesgirl

customer_reviews.title: ... these for our foyers at work and they look beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our foyers at work and they look beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but functional
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Is pretty, holds enough, and I like the swing top.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Fischli

customer_reviews.title: Great size for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Nice large trash can for the kitchen . And keeps oders in the can and not in the kitchen great deal
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Will last forever
customer_reviews.text: Great trashcan with little ones around! Very sturdy and easy to put trash into.
customer_reviews.author: William Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Swing Top Stainless Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for trash the other for recyclables. I found them to be just what I needed. A little bit hard to keep clean looking, but when they are they look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Durability is NOT its strong point.
customer_reviews.text: We have just replaced this less than a year after buying. Swinging lid broke off a few months in. Trash bag is hard to get out even when moderately full.
customer_reviews.author: GiniK

customer_reviews.title: Recommend buying 15 gallon bags (by simplehuman)
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can. 12 gallon bags fit . . . however they fill up quick and the swinging lid hits garbage quicker. Siimple human offers a 15 gallon bag (you get 3 with this can) - they allow you to use the entire capacity of the can. We like it a lot - nice and solid. Bought one on amazon (it was damaged), returned it and bought it from simplehuman.com.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, reduces smells, not idiot proof: need to learn how to use it!
customer_reviews.text: Not the most practical of garbages, but it is stylish and once you get in the habit of emptying before it overflows, it performs great. In addition, Simplehuman have amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MattMax

product_meta.title: simplehuman 55 Liter / 14.5 Gallon Commercial Swing Top Trash Can, ADA-Compliant, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Trash can onlysimplehuman's swing top can has a perfectly balanced swing lid that opens easily and then gently swings back into place. The sturdy stainless steel construction, lift-off lid, and large capacity make it an ideal choice for commercial spaces such as restaurants and coffee shops, or even busy families.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: 10-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home — for years.
CODE P CUSTOM FIT LINERS – Enhance your trash experience with extra-strong and durable trash bags that fit this can perfectly for a cleaner trash experience.
BALANCED SWING LID- Center-weighted swing lid opens easily and then gently swings back into place.
PERFECT FOR COMMERCIAL SPACES - Large capacity and an open lid make this an ideal choice for coffee shops, hotel lobbies or restaurants.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars90 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
